016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
022
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Iterator;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028/**
029 * @author rickardoberg
030 */
031public record Errors(ArrayNode json)
032        implements JsonElement, Iterable<Error> {
033
034    public record Builder(ArrayNode builder)
035            implements With<Builder>
036    {
037        public Builder() {
038            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode());
039        }
040
041        public Builder error(Error error) {
042            builder.add(error.json());
043            return this;
044        }
045
046        public Errors build() {
047            return new Errors(builder);
048        }
049    }
050
051    public boolean hasErrors() {
052        return !array().isEmpty();
053    }
054
055    public List<Error> getErrors() {
056        return JsonElement.getValuesAs(array(),Error::new);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public Iterator<Error> iterator() {
061        return getErrors().iterator();
062    }
063
064    public Map<String, Error> getErrorMap() {
065        Map<String, Error> map = new HashMap<>();
066        for (Error error : getErrors()) {
067            String pointer = error.getSource().getPointer();
068            if (pointer != null) {
069                pointer = pointer.substring(pointer.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
070            }
071            map.put(pointer, error);
072        }
073        return map;
074    }
075
076    public String getError() {
077        for (Error error : getErrors()) {
078            if (error.getSource().getPointer() == null)
079                return error.getTitle();
080        }
081
082        return null;
083    }
084}
